title: Therapeutic remodeling of the tuberculosis granuloma with 1-methyl-D-tryptophan enhances CD8

Using such imaging, we show that TB granulomas in rhesus macaques, a highly translational model of human TB pathology, are characterized by IDO1-mediated immunoregulation.
